abstract: Ian C. Livengood delivers a therapeutic dose of puzzle.
snippet: Ian C. Livengood delivers a therapeutic dose of puzzle.
lead_paragraph: MONDAY'S PUZZLE - This one went down very smoothly. A nice Monday grid that fell in great big chunks, and as soon as I sussed out the CC part of the theme, my brain said, "Oh, I really hope there are 10 of these! 'Ten cc' would be such a great theme!"
